text: is a Japanese professional basketball player who plays for Nagoya Diamond Dolphins of the B.League in Japan.https://www.bleague.jp/roster_detail/?PlayerID=10815 He represented the country in basketball. He is a native of the Mie Prefecture. ==References== ==External links== * Shuto Ando Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese men's basketball players Category:Nagoya Diamond Dolphins players Category:Sportspeople from Mie Prefecture Category:2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup players Category:Shooting guards
